overview: This study guide covers recent news stories, including political events in India, international developments, technological advancements, and business-related topics. It includes information on the Miss Universe competition, the Gaganyaan Mission, and the Realme GT 8 Pro launch, as well as articles on various social and economic issues.
key_points: Cabinet of CM Nitish Kumar: Analysis of the new cabinet formation.
Miss Universe 2025: Information regarding the competition's date, finalists, and prize money.
Threat calls to Vivek Oberoi: Reports of threats received and security measures.
Nora Fatehi on The Tonight Show: Details of her appearance and audience reaction.
Miss Jamaica at Miss Universe: Incident during the ramp walk.
PM Modi on Natural Farming: What the PM said at the Coimbatore Summit.
Chilli fields in Punjab: Reasons for the decline in chilli farming.
Jadavpur University: Formation of a team to probe alleged moral policing.
International students: Shift in priorities towards ROI, affordability, and jobs.
Maharashtra's BMC polls: Coalition crises involving Shiv Sena and Congress.
US report and India-Pakistan relations: Concerns regarding Pakistan's military success.
Gaganyaan Mission: ISRO's successful engine restart test.
Realme GT 8 Pro: Launch details including processor and battery.
Red Fort blast: Gaps in used car purchases in NCR.
Pune's growth: PMRDA's roadmap for sustainable growth.
Airspace closure: Pakistan extends ban on Indian airlines.

processes_or_flows.title: Gaganyaan Mission - Engine Restart Test
steps: ISRO conducted an engine restart test on the CE-20 engine.
The test was performed on the launch vehicle of the Gaganyaan Mission.
The success of the test is crucial for the mission's progress.

processes_or_flows.title: Used Car Purchase Safety in NCR
steps: Be aware of gaps in the purchase of used cars.
Understand four things every buyer must know (details not provided in the text).
Take precautions to avoid safety and legal issues.

examples: The ongoing Miss Universe competition is a major event.
Political dynamics are shifting in Maharashtra's BMC polls.
ISRO's successful engine test supports future space missions.
Realme's GT 8 Pro is an example of technological advancement.
Concerns about Pakistan's military success are a factor in India-Pakistan relations.
